# openfga Provider

The OpenFGA provider is used to manage [OpenFGA](https://openfga.dev) resources.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "openfga" {
  api_url = "https://openfga.example.org:8080"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_url` (String)
